articles.title: Boeing Starliner`s launch may end up in `something catastrophic`, warns NASA contractor - WION
articles.description:
A NASA contractor has appealed to the space agency to stop the upcoming Boeing Starliner launch because of serious safety concerns being raised with the wares of the aerospace company.

articles.author: Jesus Mesa
articles.title: Deaf Baby Girl Hears for First Time in 'Mind-Blowing' Gene Therapy Trial - Newsweek
articles.description: A clinical trial sponsored by the biotech company Regeneron has produced 'jaw-droppingly good' early results.
articles.content: Eighteen-month-old Opal Sandy was born completely deaf due to a rare congenital defect. No matter how loud or close a sound, she did not respond. Today, Opal's able to hear — unaided — after receivin… [+6218 chars]

articles.title: Expert: Target area of China's Chang'e-6 mission vital to understanding moon evolution - CGTN
